PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SiteCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcSite. NOTE: Extended in IFC 2x3; BuildableAreaRatio added

PropertyDef.Name: BuildableArea
PropertyDef.Definition: The area of utilization expressed as a minimum value and a maximum value - according to local building codes.

PropertyDef.Name: BuildableAreaRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of the utilization extent expressed as a minimum value and a maximum value. The ratio value may be used to derive BuildableArea.

PropertyDef.Name: BuildingHeightLimit
PropertyDef.Definition: Calculated maximum height of buildings on this site - according to local building codes.

PropertyDef.Name: GrossAreaPlanned
PropertyDef.Definition: Total planned area for the site. Used for programming the site space.
